locksmith:FreeKey.NAME: Freaky
locksmith:FreeKey.FLAVOR: Wait, I thought it was a free key!
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, summon a Dummy with #b6 HP. If it dies, add #b2 #yKeys into your hand.

locksmith:BlockKey.NAME: Block Key
locksmith:BlockKey.FLAVOR: Why is it a key? Because I'm lazy at art.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, summon a Dummy with #b12 HP. If it dies, gain #b8 #yBlock.

locksmith:Unlocker.NAME: Unlocker
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, remove all #yLocks from a random #yLocked card.

locksmith:EmptyKey.NAME: Empty Key
DESCRIPTIONS: Raise your maximum hand size by #b5. NL At the start of each combat, add #b1 #yKey into your hand.

locksmith:AntiKey.NAME: Anti Key
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. At the start of each combat, #yLock #b3 random cards.

locksmith:GremlinHornTwo.NAME: Gremlin Horn???
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever an enemy dies, gain [E] and draw #b1 card.

locksmith:VeryFreaky.NAME: Very Freaky
DESCRIPTIONS: .[] NL At the start of even numbered turns, summon a Dummy with #b6 HP. If one dies, add #b2 #yKeys into your hand.
